ratings.comment: Chris was an excellent TA! He gave straight to the point feedback on what you needed to get an A. His commentary was thought provoking and he did everything to create the best atmosphere in the small classroom. He's a great person who will talk you through anything have that be personal or school related, and he is very competent in the subject,

Chris is by far the best professor I've had! Makes lectures super relatable and really genuinely cares about students doing well. The class is speech and essay based, but the community makes speaking super easy. If you have the chance to have him as your professor, TAKE HIM!

If you have a chance to have Chris as your prof for LSC100, take it. He genuinely cares about each student and wants them to succeed. He creates a super welcoming environment that makes giving speeches super easy especially if you are nervous with public speaking. He is also super relatable and makes Comm A actually interesting. Take his class!
If you want a great caring professor, this is your guy. He is awesome and will make your college experience amazing. Would take his class any time of the week. Worth it!
Great guy, does a phenomenal job here on campus

Chris was an outstanding teacher. He genuinely cares about each of his students and gives good feedback in order to see them grow. I thought taking a comm A class would be one of my least favorite of freshman year and I ended up loving it. If you get a chance to have Chris, don't pass it up.

Chris is an awesome instructor who genuinely cares about his students and their success in the course.  He knows how to make lectures engaging and full of laughs.  I definitely enjoyed coming to this class, as a strong sense of community was build between my peers and Chris.  I would highly recommend taking a class from Chris to anyone- He's great!

Chris was always super helpful and made a comm A class amazingly enjoyable.  He turned what I thought would be my least favorite class into the one class I looked forward two three times a week.  Take chris if you have the chance. He's the best!
